name: Zinc bromide
desc: Zinc bromide (ZnBr2) is an inorganic compound with the chemical formula ZnBr2. It is a colourless salt that shares many properties with zinc chloride (ZnCl2), namely a high solubility in water forming acidic solutions, and solubility in organic solvents. It is hygroscopic and forms a dihydrate ZnBr2 · 2H2O.
Solubility: very soluble in alcohol, ether, acetone, tetrahydrofuran
Other anions:
Zinc fluoride,
Zinc chloride,
Zinc iodide
Other cations:
Cadmium bromide,
